<title level="1" pfs="">[Sallowdrudge](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2061)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Sallowdrudge](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2061)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #182: Graveclaw](/Sources.aspx?ID=143) pg. 30</row>

**Perception** +7

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +6, [Sallowshore Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +2

**Con** +2

**Int** +1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Net](/Equipment.aspx?ID=681), [_potion of water breathing_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=196), [Scale Mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=8), [Trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +4 

</row>

**HP** 25

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
trident +9,
**Damage** 1d8+4 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
trident +9 ([range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d8+4 piercing

**Entangling Net** <actions string="Single Action" />  A Sallowdrudge uses their net to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) a Medium or smaller creature within 30 feet. On a success, the target is [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) until it [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) (DC 16) or until an adjacent creature Interacts to remove the net. On a critical hit, the target is [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) rather than grabbed. The Sallowdrudge can't use Entangling Net again until they take 1 minute to refold their net.

**Spear Fisher**  ([Fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76)) A Sallowdrudge attacking an [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) target rolls the attack roll twice and takes the better result.

</column>
name: Sallowdrudge

text: Sallowdrudge Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 20 Unspecific Lore : DC 18 Specific Lore : DC 15 Sallowdrudge Source Pathfinder #182: Graveclaw pg. 30 Perception +7 Languages Common Skills Athletics +6, Crafting +6, Sallowshore Lore +4 Str +3 Dex +2 Con +2 Int +1 Wis +1 Cha +0 Items Net, potion of water breathing , Scale Mail, Trident --- AC 16 Fort +10 Ref +7 Will +4 HP 25 --- Speed 20 feet Melee Single Action trident +9, Damage 1d8+4 piercing Ranged Single Action trident +9 (range increment 20 feet), Damage 1d8+4 piercing Entangling Net Single Action A Sallowdrudge uses their net to Grapple a Medium or smaller creature within 30 feet. On a success, the target is grabbed until it Escapes (DC 16) or until an adjacent creature Interacts to remove the net. On a critical hit, the target is restrained rather than grabbed. The Sallowdrudge can't use Entangling Net again until they take 1 minute to refold their net. Spear Fisher (Fortune) A Sallowdrudge attacking an immobilized target rolls the attack roll twice and takes the better result.
